metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25427 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A Null pointer dereference vulnerability exits in MP4Box - GPAC version 0.8.0-rev177-g51a8ef874-master via the gf_isom_get_track_id function, which causes a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
